resources.string: We\'ve detected that there is already a private key on this device, are you sure yo want to replace the current private key with a new one?
Never lose or share your private key with anyone, doing so will comprimise the security of your funds.

Your private key is the most important piece of information in the NEO Economy.\n\n We will save an encrypted version on your device, but please make sure to write down the private key in another secure location so that you may retrieve your funds in case something happens to your device.
I confirm that I have backed up my private key in another secure location
This private key will be stored on your device after logging in.
Secure lock screen hasn\'t set up.\n Go to \'Settings -> Security -> Screenlock\' to set up a lock screen
Watch only let you monitor your portfolio in an isolated environment. Although you won\'t be able to send funds from these addresses you will be able to check the balance
Your address book will let you send funds all over the world without needing to remember your address
